de.lambeck.pned.elements.gui

Interface IGuiElement

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IElement, IHasZValue, ISelectable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGuiArc, IGuiNode, IGuiPlace, IGuiTransition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GuiArc, GuiElement, GuiNode, GuiPlace, GuiTransition

    public interface IGuiElement
extends IElement, IHasZValue, ISelectable
    Sub type of IElement for elements in a IGuiModel.
    Author:
    Thomas Lambeck, 4128320

    • Method Detail

      • paintElement

        void paintElement(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Paints this element.
        Parameters:
        g - The graphics context of this node.

      • contains

        boolean contains(java.awt.Point p)
        Checks if a Point is within the shape.

        Note that this refers to the shape of this node itself (place, transition) only. It does not take the area of the label into account!
        Parameters:
        p - the Point to check
        Returns:
        true if the Point is within the shape

      • getLastDrawingArea

        java.awt.Rectangle getLastDrawingArea()
        Returns the drawing area used during last invocation of paintElement.
        Returns:
        The last drawing area as Rectangle
